attributes.action: Allow all Girl Guiding members to be able to wear their uniforms to school, college or work on February 22nd 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will be a day of celebration and reflection, the birthday of the founders of Girlguiding which will be celebrating it's centenary in 2010. It would be a lovely way for girls & young women (& some not so young women) to express their pride in belonging to such a great organisation.
